Steve Ballmer sought to differentiate Microsoft's mobile platform from its competitors, referencing the company's ''smart design'' philosophy which guided the operating system. For the last few years the market has been swamped by phones of similar designs, Steve Ballmer said. ''People want a phone that makes info more accessible and helps them complete basic tasks more easily. With smart design, we're trying to go about improving that experience.'' He
